#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long int fun(long long int n)
{long long int k=0,s=0;
   long long int sq = (int) sqrt(n) + 1;
for (long long int i = 1; i < sq; i++)
{
    if(n%i==0)
    {k=n/i;
        if(k<n&&k!=i)
           {
            s=s+k;
           }
           s=s+i;
    }
}
    return s;
}

int main()
{

       long long int l;
       cin>>l;
       //long long int r;
       //cin>>r;
       long long int sum=0;

           sum=fun(l);

       cout<<sum<<endl;

    return 0;
}
